topicName: Lung and pleural cancers - recognition and referral
topicSummary: Over 43,000 new lung cancers are diagnosed each year in the UK. A full time GP is likely to diagnose approximately 1 person with lung cancer each year

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Lung and pleural cancers - recognition and referral: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: The National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) quality standards for suspected cancer have been added to this topic.

latestChanges.title: Revised
latestChanges.body: This topic is a direct implementation of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence guideline Suspected cancer: recognition and referral NICE, 2015. This CKS topic replaces the former topic on Lung cancer - suspected.
